Code Examples

This article demonstrates various code formatting. Use console.log() for debugging and Array.from() for converting iterables.

Here is a JavaScript function with a language annotation:

function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet("World"));

And a Python example for comparison:

def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("World"))

A code block without a language annotation:

$ npm install
$ npm test

HTML code with entities that must be preserved:

<div class="container">
  <p>Hello & welcome</p>
</div>

The readFileSync function reads files synchronously. That concludes our code examples.
